title: M.S., Ecology

description_1: Scholarship from Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq). Thesis title: Pressão ambiental em bacias hidrográficas do Pampa e sua relação com a ictiofauna.

title: B.S., Biological Sciences

description_1: Title: Spatial distribution modeling of three fish species (Characidae) in Atlantic Forest basins, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
column12: Title: Modelagem de distribuição espacial de três espécies de peixes (Characidae) em bacias da Mata Atlântica, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

title: MBA in Data Science e Analytics

title: GIS Technician

description_1: Participates in the process of elaborating the Strategic Areas of the Plans of Action coordinated by the Center, in the execution of PANs actions related to spatial analysis and other on-demand activities.

title: GIS Consultant
description_1: Consultant hired on several projects, general coordinator of the Institution (unpaid role) between February 2015 and August 2016, coordinator of the Landscape Management and Geoprocessing Center between 2016 and 2018. Intern in 2011.
